# Visualization Examples
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

# Count responses
awareness_data <- survey_data %>%
  count(`Have you ever used Virtual Reality (VR) or Augmented Reality (AR) in real estate?`)

# Plot pie chart
ggplot(awareness_data, aes(x = "", y = n, fill = `Have you ever used Virtual Reality (VR) or Augmented Reality (AR) in real estate?`)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 1) +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  theme_void() +
  labs(title = "VR/AR Awareness & Adoption in Real Estate") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())

```
